column1:
Nguyen Group Meeting speaking roster 2024

Please make a note of your scheduled day. If you are unable to speak on your day, or would prefer to change dates (e.g. to coincide with a milestone/conference practice talk/feeling unwell), please contact another lab member to organise a swap and edit this post to update the roster (click the “edit in new window” icon at the top of this post).

Meeting: 2pm Mondays (in person or on zoom) 45 minutes

Format: 
First (Main) Presenter: 30-minute talk in “conference style” about your work (introduction, aims, results, take home message/future direction)

Second Presenter: Will share a research journal on slack and do a 10 minute journal club.

Room: Level 7 QIMR Central (OR)
https://uqz.zoom.us/j/81979384712?pwd=TDdtcWhmOTlKNEFwNzdUQTZETktrUT09
Zoom: 819 7938 4712
Password: 3.14159
